law.catch_line: The Commissioner shall commence a delinquency proceeding against an insurer by applying to the court...

text.section: The Commissioner shall commence a delinquency proceeding against an insurer by applying to the court for an order that directs the insurer to show cause why the court should not grant the relief requested.

section.section: The court may consider an application for commencement of a delinquency proceeding only if the application is filed by the Commissioner in the name of the State.

After a hearing under the terms of the show-cause order, the court:
shall either grant or deny the application; and
may order other relief as the nature of the case and the interests of the policyholders, creditors, stockholders, members, subscribers, or the public may require.
